    • runPolicyChecks

      public static java.lang.String[] runPolicyChecks​(PolicyRules[] items)
      Checks each of the items to see if it satisfies the rules in the PolicyRules interface.
      Parameters:
      items - the items to check
      Returns:
      an array of messages - "OK" if all rules are met, or an error message.
